topics.title: A new data economy
topics.content:
Arenâ€™t you tired of tech-giants utilizing, monetizing and owning data you should own? We are determined to help shift the data economy so that you can actually **own your own data**.

To accomplish what we set out for, we are leveraging technology called [Ocean Protocol](https://oceanprotocol.com), a Web3 toolkit enabling secure and privacy-preserving publishment, discovery and consumption of data.

topics.title: Learn how to unleash your data
topics.content:
While we are in beta status, dataXchange is working software you can **try out right now**.

To get you started we prepared an interactive tutorial to guide you through unleashing your first data service in a testing playground and start **experiencing the new data economy today**.
